Docs.summary: Represents a typed entity set that is used to perform create, read, update, and delete operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectSet%601> class allows you to operate on a typed entity set without having to specify the entity set name as an argument to each method call. The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectSet%601> class extends the functionality of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> class to provide object context functionality, such as adding and deleting objects, in the context of a typed entity set that is accessed from the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>.
